creator: ian_springer@hp.com
text:
Several of the .tld files and web.xml files in examples.war contain incorrect 
DTD URLs.  For example:

http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-app_2_3.dtd
  should be:
http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_3.dtd

and:

"http://java.sun.com/dtd/web-jsptaglibrary_1_2.dtd"
  should be:
"http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-jsptaglibrary_1_2.dtd"

If you drill down on the 'should be' URL,

http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_3.dtd
http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-jsptaglibrary_1_2.dtd

Sun's site comes back with text saying the names should be the
shorter names already in the examples.
creator: bob@jadn.com
